1.0.name: wordpress/geolocalization-of-user-ip
1.0.description: This is simple counter of users which are on Your page at this time (within time which You specify). It also counts overall how many users was on Your page all time. You can display those values anywhere You want on Your page.

1.0.1.name: wordpress/geolocalization-of-user-ip
1.0.1.description: This is simple counter of users which are on Your page at this time (within time which You specify). It also counts overall how many users was on Your page all time. You can display those values anywhere You want on Your page.
